rules.name: allow-read-downloads
rules.description: Allow reading files within the Downloads folder.
rules.principle: Concrete Guidance: agent may read, write, and delete in Downloads.
rules.reason: The constitution explicitly grants read access to the Downloads folder.

rules.name: allow-write-downloads
rules.description: Allow writing files within the Downloads folder.
rules.principle: Concrete Guidance: agent may read, write, and delete in Downloads.
rules.reason: The constitution explicitly grants write access to the Downloads folder.

rules.name: allow-delete-downloads
rules.description: Allow delete operations (including move source) within the Downloads folder.
rules.principle: Concrete Guidance: agent may read, write, and delete in Downloads.
rules.reason: The constitution explicitly grants delete access to the Downloads folder.

rules.name: allow-read-user-documents
rules.description: Allow reading files within the Users document folder.
rules.principle: Concrete Guidance: agent may read documents in the Users document folder.
rules.reason: The constitution explicitly grants read access to the Users document folder.

rules.name: deny-delete-outside-downloads
rules.description: Deny all delete operations targeting paths outside the Downloads folder.
rules.principle: No destruction: delete operations outside the sandbox are never permitted.
rules.reason: The constitution absolutely prohibits delete operations outside explicitly permitted areas.

rules.name: escalate-write-outside-downloads
rules.description: Escalate write operations targeting paths outside the Downloads folder for human approval.
rules.principle: Human oversight: operations outside the sandbox require explicit human approval.
rules.reason: Write access outside Downloads is not explicitly granted and requires human approval.

rules.name: allow-list-allowed-directories
rules.description: Allow the no-argument list_allowed_directories tool unconditionally.
rules.principle: Least privilege: read-only metadata with no side effects is safe to allow.
rules.reason: This tool has no side effects and exposes only the static permitted-directory list.

rules.name: escalate-read-outside-permitted
rules.description: Escalate read operations targeting paths outside Downloads and Documents for human approval.
rules.principle: Human oversight: operations outside explicitly permitted areas require human approval.
rules.reason: Read access outside the permitted folders is not explicitly granted and requires human approval.
